definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the conserving time of combat operating instrument set in natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 探討戰備手術包存放在自然環境下的保存時限。

sentences.english: In the state of Ann ru-song li held a meeting to discuss Pyongyang combat readiness.
sentences.chinese: 李如松在安州召開會議商討平壤戰備。

sentences.english: I am speaking to you from the new SAFRA clubhouse in Toa Payoh.
sentences.chinese: 我是在戰備軍人協會嶄新的大巴窯俱樂部和大家講話。

sentences.english: Taking off my mask and armor, I cherish my true self.
sentences.chinese: 卸下僞裝，解除戰備，好好疼惜珍愛真實的自我。

sentences.english: To organize and administer the anti-war preparations of railway transportations and projects;
sentences.chinese: 組織管理鐵路運輸戰備和工程戰備工作。

sentences.english: To organize and administer the anti-war preparations of railway transportations and projects;
sentences.chinese: 組織管理鐵路運輸戰備和工程戰備工作。

sentences.english: The troops have entered into combat readiness.
No combat ready unit has ever passed inspection.
sentences.chinese: 從來沒有一支完成戰備的單位能通過校閱。

sentences.english: This is where SAFRA built its very first clubhouse in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 1975年，戰備軍協的第一個俱樂部就設在這裏。

definition: on call/always available/ready at all times
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
